notes: Modern, well-maintained apartment with recessed lighting, wood laminate flooring, built-in cabinetry, and contemporary furnishings. Good natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows with balcony access. Baby safety note: balcony has narrow vertical railings which are safe, but the sliding glass doors and balcony access on 10th floor require childproofing. No visible stairs or sharp corners; overall clean and spacious layout suitable for a family.
